alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 8:36PM EST until December 21 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Pennsylvania...New York... Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Broome and Susquehanna Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 845 AM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River at Conklin. * WHEN...Until Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flood stage. Alta, River and Lawrence Roads are closed in the Town of Conklin due to minor flooding. No homes are flooded at this river stage. Valley park in Kirkwood takes on water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:16 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 12.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 8.2 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
